title: Schools out
creator_credit: Victoria. Audio-Visual Education Centre, Ross Campbell and Alex Rappel
brief_description: Examines three innovative schools - Brinsley Road an annexe to Camberwell High school, Collingwood Community school, and Swinburne Community school. Students and teachers comment on the differences between these and traditional schools, and the relationships between pupils, teachers, and the community.
